thread.title: Two islands off the coast of Orkney on sale for £300,000
thread.title_full: Two islands off the coast of Orkney on sale for £300,000

title: Two islands off the coast of Orkney on sale for £300,000
text: show ad Two islands off the coast of Orkney go on sale for £300,000 – less than half the price of an average London home – but the new owners must be willing to ROW to the shops Islands, which together are the size of nine football pitches, have stunning views of Orkney and the North Sea The 4.9-acre Inner Holm comes with a six-bed bungalow, stone outhouses and a boat to ferry to the mainland Main house has a large living with a brick fireplace and a dining room with French doors, plus a conservatory Annexe has a further living room with kitchenette, while island's electricity is generated by 6kw wind turbine Published: 11:16 GMT, 9 February 2017 | Updated: 11:16 GMT, 9 February 2017 180 shares
